thread.title: Lamar Odom, Khloe Kardashian call off divorce amid recovery - MySanAntonio.com
thread.title_full: Lamar Odom, Khloe Kardashian call off divorce amid recovery - MySanAntonio.com - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: MySanAntonio.com
title: Lamar Odom, Khloe Kardashian call off divorce amid recovery - MySanAntonio.com
text:
In this April 30, 2012, file photo, Khloe Kardashian Odom and Lamar Odom from the show "Keeping Up With The Kardashians" attend an E! Network upfront event at Gotham Hall in New York. A family representative says Lamar Odom has left a Las Vegas hospital and is now in the Los Angeles area to continue his recovery a week after being found unconscious at a Nevada brothel.
 MySanAntonio.com.
